effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.

short_effect.black_white: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.black_white: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.
